content.raw:
Sure, there’s nothing inherently wrong with having the TPE library be a component of `ign-physics`.

The only reason to avoid that is if we want the TPE to be usable independently of `ign-physics`, in which case we should probably put it into its own repo entirely. But so long as it’s nested within the `ign-physics` repo, I think it’s sensible to just let it be a “component” library.
content.html:
Sure, there’s nothing inherently wrong with having the TPE library be a component of ign-physics.

The only reason to avoid that is if we want the TPE to be usable independently of ign-physics, in which case we should probably put it into its own repo entirely. But so long as it’s nested within the ign-physics repo, I think it’s sensible to just let it be a “component” library.
